explanation: The objects that may be involved in completing the task of rinsing off a coffee mug and placing it in the coffee maker are the Mug (to be cleaned and placed under the coffee maker), the Cup (to hold the soap for cleaning), the Coffee Maker (where the clean mug will be placed), the Soap Bottle (to provide soap for cleaning the mug), and the Dish Sponge (to scrub and clean the mug).
